content: On the lumpiness side depending on the size of these awards, and if we can layer them in and feather them in, hopefully, we donât quite see something like the big slug you might see with one Geosat program coming in, but itâs a little too early to tell on that side of the business for us to probably predict that with full certainty at this point, but as we build out a more I think robust and diversified business, we should see, I donât want to call it quite smoothness, because itâs still is a large spacecraft manufacturing endeavor, but a much more predictable sort of quarter to quarter first half second half year-to-year base of the business.
